BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business.

Items.Title: Oversight - Preparing NYC Businesses for Commercial Waste Zones.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Preparing NYC Businesses for Commercial Waste Zones.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of sanitation to establish a plan for accepting commercial solid waste at city-owned marine transfer stations
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of sanitation to establish a plan for accepting commercial solid waste at city-owned marine transfer stations.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S237, legislation to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to returnable bottles.
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a commercial waste zones working group
Items.MatterName: Creating a commercial waste zones working group.
